appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appLongDesc.message:
draw.io is a completely free Google Drive(TM) enabled diagramming application that enables you to draw:

- Flowcharts
- UML
- ERD
- Network Diagrams
- Business Process Models
- Org Charts
- Electronic circuits
- Wireframing and mockups
- and much more

Features:
- Native HTML 5 client with full IE 6-8 support.
- Large stencil library built-in
- Intuitive drag and drop interface
- Image search and add functionality
- Export to PNG/GIF/JPG/XML/SVG/PDF
- Touch device support
- Full source code at github - https://github.com/jgraph/draw.io.
- Real-time collaboration.
- Embed diagrams in blogs or wikis
appLongDesc.description: Has to be manually entered in dashboard currently.
